i < len; i++){\n        char r = s[i];\n        bool flag = false;\n        if(r == 'I' && i + 1 < len){\n            switch (s[i + 1]) {\n            case 'V':\n                res += 4;\n                i++;\n                flag = true;\n                break;\n            case 'X':\n                res += 9;\n                i++;\n                flag = true;\n                break;\n            default:\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if(r == 'X' && i + 1 < len){\n            switch (s[i + 1]) {\n            case 'L':\n                res += 40;\n                i++;\n                flag = true;\n                break;\n            case 'C':\n                res += 90;\n                i++;\n                flag = true;\n                break;\n            default:\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if(r == 'C' && i + 1 < len){\n            switch (s[i + 1]) {\n            case 'D':\n                res += 400;\n                i++;\n                flag = true;\n                break;\n            case 'M':\n                res += 900;\n                i++;\n                flag = true;\n                break;\n            default:\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if(!flag){\n            res += values[r];\n        }\n    }\n    return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
